sentences.en: Clouds return radiant energy to the surface primarily via the atmospheric window.
sentences.cn: 云主要通过大气窗区向地表辐射能量.

sentences.en: For atmospheric environments definitive standards have not been published yet.
sentences.cn: 大气环境正式标准尚未发表.

sentences.en: He received praise for the atmospheric monochrome shots in David Lynch's The Elephant Man.
sentences.cn: 他在大卫·林奇的电影《象人》中所拍摄的那些渲染气氛的黑白镜头受到了好评。

sentences.en: Its accuracy and optical resolution may be influenced by atmospheric absorption bands.
sentences.cn: 它的精密度和光学分辨力将受大气中吸收频带的影响.

sentences.en: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
sentences.cn: 古老的犹太人社区是布拉格最具特色的角落之一。

sentences.en: Sea surface temperatures and atmospheric circulation are strongly coupled.
sentences.cn: 海洋表面温度与大气环流是密切相关的.

sentences.en: The Act imposes more stringent regulations on atmospheric pollution.
sentences.cn: 法案对大气污染作出更为严格的规定.

sentences.en: The barometer marked a continuing fall in atmospheric pressure.
sentences.cn: 气压表表明气压在继续下降.

sentences.en: The description of atmospheric dispersion phenomena remains quasi - empirical and statistical.
sentences.cn: 大气扩散现象的说明仍然是准经验性的和统计性的.

sentences.en: The director employs sensuous, atmospheric camerawork and deft dramatic touches.
sentences.cn: 导演在镜头运用上既富有美感又渲染了气氛，戏剧手法的运用也娴熟自如。

sentences.en: The film is a well made, atmospheric, consummately acted piece.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是一部制作精良、很有味道、表演臻于完美的作品。

sentences.en: The observer should always make full notes about the atmospheric conditions.
sentences.cn: 观测者要对大气条件作详细记录.

sentences.en: The tephigram is a thermodynamic particularly suitable for representing atmospheric processes.
sentences.cn: 温熵图是一种热力学图,特别适合于描述大气过程.

sentences.en: The upper surface of the fluid is under atmospheric pressure.
sentences.cn: 流体上表面受大气压力作用.

sentences.en: They used an air compressor to take in atmospheric air , compress it, and force it into the cabin.
sentences.cn: 他们用一台空气压缩机把大气中的空气吸进来, 加以压缩, 然后送入船舱.

phrases.tran_cn: 大气层；大气壳层（等于atmospheric shell）
大气降水，大气沉降；降水
n. 大气科学；空间科学

trans.tran_cn: 大气的，令人激动的，有魅力的
